BLOCK.QRY: update ACTIA_AUDIT_SCH_TRN t set t.str_audit_status=? where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL t set t.STR_DOCS_RECEIVED='Y' where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.NUM_DOCS_SL_NO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_L_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_REP_TRN (NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,STR_REMARKS,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_ACTION_TAKEN_BY,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) ( SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,T.STR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_ACTION_TAKEN_BY,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_L_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_REP_TRN A where A.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_REPLY_TRN T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

INSERT INTO ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL (NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,NUM_DOCS_SL_NO,STR_DOCS_REQ_NAME,STR_DOCS_RECEIVED,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) ( SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,T.NUM_DOCS_SL_NO,T.STR_DOCS_REQ_NAME,STR_DOCS_RECEIVED,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL A where A.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_REPLY_TRN t set t.STR_REMARKS=?,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL t set t.STR_DOCS_RECEIVED='N' where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PREL_ENQ_DTL t set t.STR_DOCS_RECEIVED='Y' where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.NUM_DOCS_SL_NO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

insert into ACTIA_AUDIT_REPLY_DTL A (A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, A.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE, A.NUM_AUDIT_REP_SLNO,A.STR_REPLY_DESCRIP, A.GNUM_ISVALID,A.GNUM_SEAT_ID, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, A.NUM_SL_NO,A.DT_PROPOSED_PARA_DATE, A.STR_PROPOSED_PARA ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
